sentences.en: a hurricane that was in the process of devastating South Carolina.
sentences.cn: 正在肆虐南卡罗来纳州的飓风。

sentences.en: All university applications are processed through this system.
sentences.cn: 所有大学入学申请都是由这个系统处理的。

sentences.en: All university applications are processed through this system. ＃
sentences.cn: 所有大学入学申请都是由这个系统处理的。

sentences.en: Cells divide and renew as part of the human growth process.
sentences.cn: 细胞不断地分裂更新，这是人体发育过程的一部分。

sentences.en: Goats’ cheese may be processed in many ways.
sentences.cn: 山羊奶干酪可以有多种加工方法。

sentences.en: He is more didactic in his approach to the learning process.
sentences.cn: 他在教学过程中侧重于灌输。

sentences.en: He wanted to use computers to automate the process.
sentences.cn: 他想通过计算机实现流程的自动化。

sentences.en: He would soon launch a second offensive, killing off the peace process.
sentences.cn: 他不久将会再次发动进攻，彻底毁掉整个和平进程。

sentences.en: In the past this process of transition has often proven difficult.
sentences.cn: 过去这一过渡过程常常很艰难。

sentences.en: Is the recycling process in itself damaging to the environment?
sentences.cn: 这一回收利用过程本身对环境有害吗？

sentences.en: It is hard to overestimate the potential gains from this process.
sentences.cn: 这一工艺的潜在收益不可估量。

sentences.en: Recycling is an industrial process.
sentences.cn: 回收利用是一个工业流程。

sentences.en: Repetition can help the learning process.
sentences.cn: 重复对学习过程会有帮助。

sentences.en: she would make him pay for this, even if she killed herself in the process.
sentences.cn: 她一定要让他为此付出代价，哪怕在此过程中自己可能会丧命。

sentences.en: the car production process
sentences.cn: 汽车的生产流程

sentences.en: the Israeli-Egyptian peace process
sentences.cn: 以－埃和平进程

sentences.en: The judge said that arbitration was a fair and expeditious decision-making process.
sentences.cn: 法官说仲裁是公平且迅速有效的判决过程。

sentences.en: The move represents a setback for the Middle East peace process.
sentences.cn: 这个行动意味着中东和平进程受挫。

sentences.en: the process of economic change
sentences.cn: 经济改革的进程

sentences.en: The process of judicial selection was held up to ridicule.
sentences.cn: 司法选举的过程成为了笑柄。

sentences.en: The process of replication is very quick and efficient.
sentences.cn: 复制的过程快捷、高效。

sentences.en: The thoroughness of the evaluation process we went through was impressive.
sentences.cn: 我们亲历的评估过程面面俱到，给人留下了深刻印象。

sentences.en: The turning point in the process of growing up is when you discover the core of strength within you that survives all hurt.
sentences.cn: 当你从内心深处找到一种可以忍受一切痛苦的坚强力量时，你的成长历程就会出现飞跃。

sentences.en: Then stone the fruit and process the plums to a puree.
sentences.cn: 然后去核再将李子加工成糊状。

sentences.en: Too much protein in the diet may advance the ageing process.
sentences.cn: 饮食中摄入过量蛋白质可能会加速衰老。

sentences.en: Two million workers are employed processing goods for electronic firms.
sentences.cn: 200 万名工人受雇为电子公司加工产品。

过程，变化过程，做事方法
trans.tran_en: a series of actions that are done in order to achieve a particular result

trans.tran_cn: 加工，处理，冲印，审核，列队行进
trans.tran_en: to make food, materials, or goods ready to be used or sold, for example by preserving or improving them in some way

trans.tran_cn: 加工， 处理， 办理
trans.tran_en: to make food, materials, or goods ready to be used or sold, for example by preserving or improving them in some way
